forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Windy with showers continuing late. Low 8C. W winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing late. Low near 45F. W winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain early with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds W at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
